channel.title: Name

item.title: Name
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

How can I make it autoban and disconnect an account that logs in using my name?

my user is Stewie and people login as stewie fdgdfg

can i do like if playerName.startsWith (“Stewie”) && Length > 7
writeLogs (“Bans”;
disconnected = true;

} else
login = true;

im almost 100% sure that has mistakes but can i make something like that to do that

Read full topic
